title: Cheeky Bastard by The Scratch
lyrics:
He’s got the geansaí and the jean shorts
Wouldn’t be the kind of man that’s handy at sports
He’s got a heart of gold
A ticket never stopped a man from getting bold 

Never seen a man knock back Black Russians
Wouldn’t say he thinks about the repercussions 
Couple of sips, quick lip of the lips and he’s piping up 
Piping up

Hussey, sing us a song, sing us a song will ya?
He won’t stop singing Champagne Supernova

Good luck to ye
Wouldn’t wanna tell this lad he’s had enough
Those shots are etched in his head man
And his shirt’s on backwards so ye know he’s brown bread man

Never seen a man knock back Black Russians
Wouldn’t say he thinks about the repercussions 
Couple of sips, quick lip of the lips and he’s piping up 
Piping up

Hussey, sing us a song, sing us a song will ya
He won’t stop singing Champagne Supernova
Hussey, sing us a song, sing us a song will ya?
He won’t stop singing Champagne Supernova

Pigeon French, a shirt like a beach towel 
Showboating even with your back teeth floating 

Hussey, sing us a song, sing us a song will ya?
He won’t stop singing Champagne Supernova
Hussey, sing us a song, sing us a song will ya?
He won’t stop singing Champagne Supernova
